thread.title: Lamar Odom spent more than average American's yearly income at...
thread.title_full: Lamar Odom spent more than average American's yearly income at... | www.ajc.com

author: Cox Media Group National Content Desk
title: Lamar Odom spent more than average American's yearly income at...
text:
Sources are saying that Lamar Odom spent a shocking amount of money at the brothel he was staying at before he was rushed to a Nevada hospital after being found unconscious.
In the days he was at the Love Ranch, Odom is said to have spent $75,000 at the brothel, CNN reported.
>> Read more trending stories
The money allegedly guaranteed two women would "take care of any of his needs," Dennis Hof told HLN .
It was commonly known as the "girlfriend experience," NBC News reported.
Employees of the brothel told 911 that Odom had used cocaine on Saturday, his first night there, as well as 10 herbal supplements over three days.
He was found, according to 911 tapes, in his bed with blood coming from his nose and "white stuff coming out of his mouth", NBC News reported.
Odom is currently on a ventilator after having at least one stroke, sources told NBC News . He also has apparently suffered some brain damage, the same sources told NBC News .
